Package org.openadaptor.core.transaction

Transaction and Transaction Manager interfaces and base implementation.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ITransaction Interface which describes an openadaptor Transaction.
ITransactional Should be implemented by IReadConnectors and IWriteConnectors that are capable of taking part in a transaction.
ITransactionalResource Represents a class that knows how to implement transactional semmantics for a given transport / middleware.
ITransactionInitiator represents a component that will be initiating transactions and thus needs to create them using an ITransactionManager.
ITransactionManager Represents a transaction manager that is capable of creating new ITransactions.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTransaction base functionality for ITransaction implementations.
Transaction Basic (and default) implementation of ITransaction that collects and invokes ITransactionalResources.
TransactionManager Basic (and default) transaction manager.
 

Package org.openadaptor.core.transaction Description

Transaction and Transaction Manager interfaces and base implementation.
